title: Explore Dhaka's Heritage
shortDescrition: Discover the rich history and culture of Dhaka on this immersive heritage tour.
about: Explore the heart of Dhaka, the vibrant capital city of Bangladesh. From the historic Ahsan Manzil to the impressive Lalbag Fort and the serene Sat Gambuj Mosque, this tour offers a deep dive into the city's heritage. Enjoy guided tours, traditional cuisine, and cultural activities throughout your stay.
highlights: Visit the historic Ahsan Manzil
Explore the Lalbag Fort
Admire the architecture of Sat Gambuj Mosque
Experience traditional Bengali cuisine
Participate in local cultural activities

itinerary.title: Arrive in Dhaka
activities: Arrive at Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport (DAC) and transfer to your hotel.
Meet your tour guide and fellow travelers at a welcome dinner.
Optional evening stroll in the city.

itinerary.title: Tour of Ahsan Manzil
activities: Morning visit to Ahsan Manzil, the Pink Palace.
Learn about its history and significance.
Afternoon free for leisure or optional activities.

itinerary.title: Explore Lalbag Fort
activities: Guided tour of Lalbag Fort.
Visit the museum inside the fort.
Enjoy a traditional Bengali lunch.

itinerary.title: Visit Sat Gambuj Mosque
activities: Morning visit to Sat Gambuj Mosque.
Learn about its architectural significance.
Afternoon free for shopping or leisure activities.

itinerary.title: Depart from Dhaka
activities: Transfer to the airport for your departure.

excluded: Flights to and from the destination

title: Chittagong Hill Tracts Adventure
shortDescrition: Experience the natural beauty and cultural diversity of the Chittagong Hill Tracts.
about: Embark on an adventure through the Chittagong Hill Tracts, exploring the stunning landscapes of Bandarban, Khagrachari, and Rangamati. This tour offers a mix of outdoor activities, cultural experiences, and breathtaking views.
highlights: Hike through the scenic Bandarban hills
Visit traditional tribal villages in Khagrachari
Enjoy a boat ride on Kaptai Lake in Rangamati
Explore the diverse flora and fauna of the region
Experience local tribal culture and cuisine

itinerary.title: Arrive in Chittagong
activities: Arrive at Shah Amanat International Airport (CGP) and transfer to your hotel.
Meet your tour guide and fellow travelers at a welcome dinner.
Optional evening walk in the city.

itinerary.title: Travel to Bandarban
activities: Morning transfer to Bandarban.
Explore the local market and visit Nilgiri Hills.
Evening free for leisure.

itinerary.title: Bandarban Hiking
activities: Full-day hiking tour in the Bandarban hills.
Visit tribal villages and enjoy the scenic views.

itinerary.title: Travel to Khagrachari
activities: Morning transfer to Khagrachari.
Visit traditional tribal villages.
Enjoy local cuisine and cultural activities.

itinerary.title: Khagrachari Exploration
activities: Explore the natural beauty of Khagrachari.
Visit waterfalls and scenic spots.

itinerary.title: Travel to Rangamati
activities: Morning transfer to Rangamati.
Enjoy a boat ride on Kaptai Lake.
Visit the Chakma Royal Palace and local market.

itinerary.title: Depart from Rangamati
activities: Transfer to the airport for your departure.

excluded: Flights to and from the destination

title: Sundarbans Wildlife Safari
shortDescrition: Discover the unique wildlife and natural beauty of the Sundarbans, the largest mangrove forest in the world.
about: Join us on an exciting wildlife safari through the Sundarbans, home to the Royal Bengal Tiger and a rich variety of flora and fauna. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, nature exploration, and cultural experiences.
highlights: Boat safari through the Sundarbans mangrove forest
Spot Royal Bengal Tigers and other wildlife
Visit local fishing villages and meet the community
Explore the diverse flora and fauna of the region
Learn about the conservation efforts in the Sundarbans

itinerary.title: Arrive in Khulna
activities: Arrive at Jessore Airport (JSR) and transfer to Khulna.
Meet your tour guide and fellow travelers at a welcome dinner.
Optional evening walk along the river.

itinerary.title: Travel to Sundarbans
activities: Morning transfer to Mongla port.
Board the boat for your Sundarbans adventure.
Explore the mangrove forest and spot wildlife.

itinerary.title: Sundarbans Exploration
activities: Full-day exploration of the Sundarbans.
Visit wildlife sanctuaries and local villages.
Learn about the conservation efforts in the region.

itinerary.title: More Sundarbans Adventures
activities: Continue exploring the Sundarbans.
Spot Royal Bengal Tigers and other wildlife.
Evening campfire and cultural program.

itinerary.title: Depart from Sundarbans
activities: Morning transfer back to Mongla port.
Travel to Jessore Airport for your departure.

excluded: Flights to and from the destination

title: Tea Gardens and Tribal Heritage
shortDescrition: Explore the lush tea gardens of Sylhet and immerse yourself in the rich tribal heritage of the region.
about: Discover the beauty of Sylhet's tea gardens and experience the vibrant tribal culture on this 6-day tour. Enjoy scenic views, cultural performances, and visits to traditional villages.
highlights: Visit the picturesque tea gardens of Sylhet
Explore the Ratargul Swamp Forest
Experience the tribal culture of Jaflong
Enjoy traditional dance performances
Taste authentic tribal cuisine

itinerary.title: Arrive in Sylhet
activities: Arrive at Osmani International Airport (ZYL) and transfer to your hotel.
Meet your tour guide and fellow travelers at a welcome dinner.
Optional evening walk in the city.

itinerary.title: Sylhet Tea Gardens
activities: Morning visit to the lush tea gardens.
Learn about the tea-making process.
Afternoon free for leisure.

itinerary.title: Explore Jaflong
activities: Full-day tour of Jaflong.
Visit tribal villages and experience local culture.
Enjoy traditional dance performances.

itinerary.title: Ratargul Swamp Forest
activities: Morning visit to the Ratargul Swamp Forest.
Boat ride through the forest.
Afternoon free for leisure.

itinerary.title: Free Day in Sylhet
activities: Enjoy a free day to explore Sylhet at your own pace.
Optional activities such as shopping or visiting local attractions.

itinerary.title: Depart from Sylhet
activities: Transfer to the airport for your departure.

excluded: Flights to and from the destination
